SEARCH
Package us.ullberg.startpunkt.websocket

Class UpdatesWebSocket

java.lang.Object
us.ullberg.startpunkt.websocket.UpdatesWebSocket
public class UpdatesWebSocket extends Object
WebSocket endpoint for real-time updates to clients.

This endpoint allows clients to receive real-time notifications about changes in applications, bookmarks, configuration, and status updates without requiring HTTP polling.
